dt: {bc}a song or poem expressing sorrow or lamentation especially for one who is dead
{bc}something (such as a speech) resembling such a song or poem
{bc}a pensive or reflective poem that is usually nostalgic or melancholy

et: Latin {it}elegia{/it} poem in elegiac couplets, from Greek {it}elegeia, elegeion{/it}, from {it}elegos{/it} song of mourning
shortdef: a song or poem expressing sorrow or lamentation especially for one who is dead
something (such as a speech) resembling such a song or poem
